text: So explain again why my beloved restaurant is very,/ very empty?
Aw come on now!/ It's not empty,/ we got the two line cooks here...
And as far as customers,/ we got Chonkers McRhonkers over there!/ What more could you need?
Hm./ Mhm./././ Well ideally you'd have at least TWO customers...
Oh Chonkers eats plenty!/ Even with just her,/ she's doing a lot to keep us afloat.
I mean,/ afloat might be a strong word./ She's makin' us sink a little slower I guess.
Maybe kind of like a, hmm./././ Like a anchor made of something slightly buoyant.
